me athara 19 wani wyawastha sanshodhanaye adupadu sakas karaganima sandaha parlimenthuwa ganna kriyamarga walata janadhipathiwaraya ekangathawa pala kara thibe. “19 wana sanshodhanaye yam karya patipatimaya durwalatha athnam, sha්ri lanka aanduka්rama wyawasthawe 19 wana sanshodhanaye haraya saha emagin athi karanu labu pa්rajathantha්rawadi saraya aaraksha kara ganimin eya thawaduratath poshanaya karamin, deshapalana washayen gatalu sahagatha wanna wu karunuwalata adala sanshodhana parlimenthu ki්rayamarga anuwa sidu kirimata janadhipathi garu maithi්rapala sirisena mathithuma kapawi sitina bawa awadharanaya karayi,” yanuwen janadhipathi madhya anshaya wisin desambara 6 da nikuth kala niwedanayaka dakwe.
